name: pure-storage
label: Pure Storage
description: Pure Storage is a leading provider of enterprise data storage solutions. It is specialize in all-flash storage arrays, delivering high-performance, reliable, and scalable storage solutions for businesses. Its technology utilizes solid-state drives (SSDs) to provide fast and consistent access to data. With Pure Storage, organizations can accelerate applications, improve productivity, and make data-driven decisions. Experience the power of next-generation storage technology with Pure Storage.

fields.name: server_url
fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Server name or IP address to which you will connect and perform the automated operations

fields.name: token
fields.title: JWT Token
fields.description: API key(in JWT format) to access the endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations

fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Alert List
operations.description: Retrieves information about alerts generated by Pure1-monitored appliances from Pure Storage.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.title: Alert IDs
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated alert IDs to retrieve the corresponding alerts. If there is not at least one resource that matches each id element, an error is returned.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the comma-separated alert IDs to retrieve the corresponding alerts. If there is not at least one resource that matches each id element, an error is returned.

parameters.name: names
parameters.title: Names
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated alert names to retrieve the corresponding alerts. If there is not at least one resource that matches each name element, an error is returned.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the comma-separated alert names to retrieve the corresponding alerts. If there is not at least one resource that matches each name element, an error is returned.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.title: Filter Query
parameters.tooltip: Specify the filter criteria to retrieve required alerts. Single quotes are required around all strings inside the filters.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the filter criteria to retrieve required alerts. Single quotes are required around all strings inside the filters.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.title: Sort Fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify fields to sort the alerts. If you want to sort in descending order then append '-' to the field name. Note: If you provide a sort you will not get a continuation token in the response.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify fields to sort the alerts. If you want to sort in descending order then append '-' to the field name. Note: If you provide a sort you will not get a continuation token in the response.

parameters.name: continuation_token
parameters.title: Continuation Token
parameters.tooltip: Specify continuation token returned in the continuation_token field of previous request to iterate on collection. Note: Single quotes are required around all strings.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify continuation token returned in the continuation_token field of previous request to iterate on collection. Note: Single quotes are required around all strings.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.title: Offset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the offset of the first resource to return from a collection.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the offset of the first resource to return from a collection.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.title: Limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of resources to be retrieve in this request. By default it will retrieve 1000 resources.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of resources to be retrieve in this request. By default it will retrieve 1000 resources.

operations.title: Get Array List
operations.description: Retrieves information about FlashArray and FlashBlade storage appliances from Pure Storage.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.title: Array IDs
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated array IDs to retrieve the corresponding arrays. If there is not at least one resource that matches each id element, an error is returned.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the comma-separated array IDs to retrieve the corresponding arrays. If there is not at least one resource that matches each id element, an error is returned.

parameters.name: names
parameters.title: Array Names
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated array names to retrieve the corresponding arrays. If there is not at least one resource that matches each name element, an error is returned.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the comma-separated array names to retrieve the corresponding arrays. If there is not at least one resource that matches each name element, an error is returned.

parameters.title: Filter Query
parameters.tooltip: Specify the filter criteria to retrieve required arrays. Single quotes are required around all strings inside the filters.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the filter criteria to retrieve required arrays. Single quotes are required around all strings inside the filters.

parameters.name: fqdns

parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the comma-separated resource FQDNs. If there is not at least one resource that matches each fqdn element, an error is returned.

parameters.name: sort

parameters.tooltip: Specify fields to sort the arrays. If you want to sort in descending order then append '-' to the field name. Note: If you provide a sort you will not get a continuation token in the response.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify fields to sort the arrays. If you want to sort in descending order then append '-' to the field name. Note: If you provide a sort you will not get a continuation token in the response.

parameters.description: (Optional) Specify continuation token returned in the continuation_token field of previous request to iterate on collection. Note: Single quotes are required around all strings.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.title: Offset
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the offset of the first resource to return from a collection.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.title: Limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of resources to be retrieve in this request. By default it will retrieve 1000 resources.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of resources to be retrieve in this request. By default it will retrieve 1000 resources.

operations.title: Delete Array Tags
operations.description: Deletes the the tags from Pure Storage based on input parameters specified.

parameters.name: resource_ids
parameters.title: Resource IDs
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated resource IDs to delete the corresponding array tags. If there is not at least one resource that matches each id element, an error is returned. Note: This parameter is required if Resource Names is not specified.
parameters.description: Specify the comma-separated resource IDs to delete the corresponding array tags. If there is not at least one resource that matches each id element, an error is returned. Note: This parameter is required if Resource Names is not specified.

parameters.name: resource_names
parameters.title: Resource Names
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated resource names to delete the corresponding array tags. If there is not at least one resource that matches each name element, an error is returned. Note: This parameter is required if Resource IDs is not specified.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the comma-separated resource names to delete the corresponding array tags. If there is not at least one resource that matches each name element, an error is returned. Note: This parameter is required if Resource IDs is not specified.

parameters.name: keys
parameters.title: Keys
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated tag keys to delete the corresponding array tags.
parameters.description: (Optional) comma-separated tag keys to delete the corresponding array tags.

parameters.name: namespaces
parameters.title: Namespaces
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated namespaces to delete the corresponding tags.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify comma-separated namespaces to delete the corresponding tags.

operations.title: Create or Update Array Tags
operations.description: Creates or Updates Array Tags Pure Storage based on input parameters specified.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.title: Tags
parameters.tooltip: Specify list of tags to be upserted.

parameters.name: resource_ids
parameters.title: Resource IDs
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated resource IDs to create or update the corresponding array tags. If there is not at least one resource that matches each id element, an error is returned. Note: This parameter is required if Resource Names is not specified.
parameters.description: Specify the comma-separated resource IDs to create or update the corresponding array tags. If there is not at least one resource that matches each id element, an error is returned. Note: This parameter is required if Resource Names is not specified.

parameters.name: resource_names
parameters.title: Resource Names
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated resource names to create or update the corresponding array tags. If there is not at least one resource that matches each name element, an error is returned. Note: This parameter is required if Resource IDs is not specified.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the comma-separated resource names to create or update the corresponding array tags. If there is not at least one resource that matches each name element, an error is returned. Note: This parameter is required if Resource IDs is not specified.

operations.title: Get Directory List
operations.description: Retrieves information about FlashArray managed directory objects from Pure Storage.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.title: Directory IDs
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated directory IDs to retrieve the corresponding directories. If there is not at least one resource that matches each id element, an error is returned.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the comma-separated directory IDs to retrieve the corresponding directories. If there is not at least one resource that matches each id element, an error is returned.

parameters.name: names
parameters.title: Directory Names
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated directory names to retrieve the corresponding directories. If there is not at least one resource that matches each name element, an error is returned.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the comma-separated directory names to retrieve the corresponding directories. If there is not at least one resource that matches each name element, an error is returned.

parameters.name: file_system_ids
parameters.title: File System IDs
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated directory IDs to retrieve the corresponding directories. If there is not at least one resource that matches each id element, an error is returned.
parameters.description:
(Optional) Specify the file system ID to perform the operation . Enter multiple file system IDs in comma-separated format. For example file_system_id1, file_system_id2. 
 Note: This parameter cannot be provided if File System Names is provided and vice-versa.

parameters.name: file_system_names
parameters.title: File System Names
parameters.tooltip: Specify the file system name to perform the operation. If there is not at least one resource that matches each name element, an error is returned.
parameters.description:
(Optional) Specify the file system name to perform the operation. If there is not at least one resource that matches each name element, an error is returned. For example filesystem1,filesystem2 
 Note: This parameter cannot be provided if File System IDs is provided and vice-versa.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.title: Filter Query
parameters.tooltip: Specify the filter criteria to retrieve required directories. Single quotes are required around all strings inside the filters.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the filter criteria to retrieve required directories. Single quotes are required around all strings inside the filters.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.title: Sort Fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify fields to sort the directories. If you want to sort in descending order then append '-' to the field name. Note: If you provide a sort you will not get a continuation token in the response.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify fields to sort the directories. If you want to sort in descending order then append '-' to the field name. Note: If you provide a sort you will not get a continuation token in the response.

parameters.description: (Optional) Specify continuation token returned in the continuation_token field of previous request to iterate on collection. Note: Single quotes are required around all strings.
